queries.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ?:returned_products ( id int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, order_id int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, contract_id int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, vendor_id int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, type varchar(32) NULL DEFAULT 'exchange_product', status varchar(32) NULL DEFAULT 'active', products text NULL, timestamp int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ?:returned_product_images ( image_id int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, order_id int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, product_id int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, path text NULL, PRIMARY KEY (image_id) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ?:returned_product_descriptions ( description_id int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `from` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `to` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, order_id int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, description text NULL, PRIMARY KEY (description_id) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1;
